item.title: Sentiment Classification: Movie Reviews
item.description: Context The objective is to accurately identify whether a movie was positively or negatively received through text reviews from IMDb. This is a process that is often referred to as Sentiment Classification. Though seemingly trivial, there were multiple aspects that made this problem more challenging: Input data size is not consistent (different review lengths) Small differences are often relevant, ruling out standard similarity methods There are a lot of distinct dependencies across words Time constraints: 1 week for coding & reporting Data Amazons IMDb (Internet Movie Database) is known as the world’s most popular source for movie reviews.
